verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Verse 1:
I know there are creatures all around You
I know there are lightnings and thunderings
I know there's a storm all around You
Holy, Holy, Holy

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Verse 2:
I see seven lamps of fire burning and I,
I see a sea of glass mingled with fire burning,
I see the Son of man with eyes of fire burning,
Burning, burning, burning

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Halle-halle-hallelujah, for the Lord God Omnipotent reigns
Halle-halle-hallelujah, for the Lord God Omnipotent reigns

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bridge:
Everyone in the temple cries Glory
Everyone in the temple cries Glory
